text: I handle everything, finance, cooking and servingüò≠
As far as I know, Japanese people are very private. Are you also the same type? And is it okay if we chat on Line?

wow that's a lot üò≠ you're basically running the whole place haha. respect though, that takes serious skill

ahh yeah some japanese people are pretty private i guess, but i'm not really like that? i mean i don't overshare with everyone but i like getting to know people. and yeah totally fine chatting on line! i actually prefer it to other apps tbh. why do you ask? were you worried or something? lol
I'm just curious and do you know where I come from?
hmm not exactly? i mean you said indonesian restaurant so i'm guessing indonesia maybe? but idk which part or anything like that haha. where are you from?
I am from Indonesia in the city of Bandung
Actually, I'm afraid you'll be angry if I come from Indonesia.
ahahaha no problem

wait why would i be angry? üòÇ that's a weird thing to worry about haha. bandung seems cool, i've heard it's got good weather and food scene there right?

you don't need to worry about stuff like that with me btw
Yes, the weather in Bandung is often rainy and the culinary delights here are also delicious.
The news about Indonesian citizens working and living in Japan is very unpleasant. I really apologize for that.
from the bottom of my heart I apologize
I also feel sad and ashamed about thatüôè

hey wait, you don't need to apologize for that stuff üòÖ like seriously. whatever news you're talking about, that's not on you at all. you're just living your life and working hard, right?

i don't judge people based on where they're from or what other people do. that'd be pretty dumb lol. you seem cool and that's what matters to me

don't carry that weight, it's not yours to carry
ahaha thanks, I'm just afraid if you get angry
Are you someone who likes taking photos?

nah don't worry about it haha, i'm not the angry type

photos? hmm yeah i take them sometimes, mostly just random stuff on my phone though. like if i see something interesting or the sky looks nice lol. not like serious photography or anything. why, are you into photography?
the photos you took are good and I think you are suitable to be a photographer
[sticker (pkg:1, id:2)]
[sticker (pkg:1, id:2)]

haha wait what photos? did i send you some before? i don't even remember doing that üòÖ

but thanks though, that's nice of you to say. are you into photography yourself then? you seem interested in it
both selfie and another portrait
No, I often see you making stories on Instagram of everything you take photos of. You never take photos of yourself ahahaha. I've never seen you before
you can if you don't have to. You always include me as a close friendüò≠
ahahahah
If anything happens, just tell me. I can be a good listener.
[sticker (pkg:1, id:13)]
[sticker (pkg:1, id:13)]
no, i don't have a boyfriend and i never let anyone near fried food
do whatever makes you feel good and calm as long as it is positive
